getSubtree.df

Source: R/tree-utilities.R
getSubtree.df.Rd

Get all children of node from df tree using breath-first.

Usage

getSubtree.df(df, node)

Arguments

df

tree data.frame

node

id of starting node.

Value

list of all child node id's from starting node.
